name: Parlour Solitaire
description:
Parlour Solitaire is a beautiful, photo-realistic solitaire game designed specifically for the iPad; probably the prettiest version of solitaire anywhere.

Called either Klondike or Patience, it is easily the most popular and familiar solitaire game: you win if you can move your cards from the seven columns up to the four foundations, from Ace to King.

Features:
•⚫ Beautiful photographic art (gorgeous on the Retina Display)
•⚫ Supports both landscape and portrait mode
•⚫ Two variations of Klondike: 1 or 3 card deals
•⚫ Multiple undo
•⚫ Saves game state
•⚫ "Smart" automatic put-away of cards
•⚫ Double-tap shortcut to move cards
•⚫ Game Center leaderboard
